-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Microformats 2 types (with Aeson instances)
--   
@package microformats2-types
@version 0.4.0


-- | Microformats 2 types for Haskell.
--   
--   Notes:
--   
--   <ol>
--   <li>We don't duplicate sub-properties in parent types. E.g. h-adr has
--   both p-geo and p-latitude, p-longitude, p-altitude. Adr only has a
--   Geo.</li>
--   <li>Lazy Text is used for storing texts, because it's the format used
--   in Scotty, Hastache and other popular web libraries.</li>
--   <li>Lists are used everywhere, because all properties might be
--   multivalued, even though it doesn't always make sense. Use
--   <tt>headMay</tt> from the safe package!</li>
--   <li>SomethingReference sum types are used for, well, references. The
--   spec always makes embedded microformats optional, so these types
--   include Text options.</li>
--   </ol>
module Data.Microformats2

-- | A Geo reference.
data GeoReference
TextGeo :: Text -> GeoReference
UrlGeo :: Text -> GeoReference
GeoGeo :: Geo -> GeoReference

-- | An Adr reference.
data AdrReference
TextAdr :: Text -> AdrReference
AdrAdr :: Adr -> AdrReference

-- | A location (Card<i>Adr</i>Geo) reference.
data LocationReference
TextLoc :: Text -> LocationReference
CardLoc :: Card -> LocationReference
AdrLoc :: Adr -> LocationReference
GeoLoc :: Geo -> LocationReference

-- | A Card reference.
data CardReference
TextCard :: Text -> CardReference
CardCard :: Card -> CardReference

-- | An Entry/Cite reference.
data EntryReference
TextEntry :: Text -> EntryReference
UrlEntry :: Text -> EntryReference
CiteEntry :: Cite -> EntryReference
EntryEntry :: Entry -> EntryReference

-- | A content reference.
data ContentReference
TextContent :: Text -> ContentReference
PandocContent :: Pandoc -> ContentReference

-- | A Geo type, based on h-geo <a>http://microformats.org/wiki/h-geo</a>
data Geo
Geo :: [Double] -> [Double] -> [Double] -> Geo
geoLatitude :: Geo -> [Double]
geoLongitude :: Geo -> [Double]
geoAltitude :: Geo -> [Double]

-- | An Adr type, based on h-adr <a>http://microformats.org/wiki/h-adr</a>
data Adr
Adr :: [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [GeoReference] -> Adr
adrStreetAddress :: Adr -> [Text]
adrExtendedAddress :: Adr -> [Text]
adrPostOfficeBox :: Adr -> [Text]
adrLocality :: Adr -> [Text]
adrRegion :: Adr -> [Text]
adrPostalCode :: Adr -> [Text]
adrCountryName :: Adr -> [Text]
adrLabel :: Adr -> [Text]
adrGeo :: Adr -> [GeoReference]

-- | A Card type, based on h-card
--   <a>http://microformats.org/wiki/h-card</a>
data Card
Card :: [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [AdrReference] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [UTCTime] -> [Text] -> [CardReference] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [UTCTime] -> Card
cardName :: Card -> [Text]
cardHonorificPrefix :: Card -> [Text]
cardGivenName :: Card -> [Text]
cardAdditionalName :: Card -> [Text]
cardFamilyName :: Card -> [Text]
cardSortString :: Card -> [Text]
cardHonorificSuffix :: Card -> [Text]
cardNickname :: Card -> [Text]
cardEmail :: Card -> [Text]
cardLogo :: Card -> [Text]
cardPhoto :: Card -> [Text]
cardUrl :: Card -> [Text]
cardUid :: Card -> [Text]
cardCategory :: Card -> [Text]
cardAdr :: Card -> [AdrReference]
cardTel :: Card -> [Text]
cardNote :: Card -> [Text]
cardBday :: Card -> [UTCTime]
cardKey :: Card -> [Text]
cardOrg :: Card -> [CardReference]
cardJobTitle :: Card -> [Text]
cardRole :: Card -> [Text]
cardImpp :: Card -> [Text]
cardSex :: Card -> [Text]
cardGenderIdentity :: Card -> [Text]
cardAnniversary :: Card -> [UTCTime]

-- | A Cite type, based on h-cite
--   <a>http://microformats.org/wiki/h-cite</a>
data Cite
Cite :: [Text] -> [UTCTime] -> [CardReference] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [UTCTime] -> [ContentReference] -> Cite
citeName :: Cite -> [Text]
citePublished :: Cite -> [UTCTime]
citeAuthor :: Cite -> [CardReference]
citeUrl :: Cite -> [Text]
citeUid :: Cite -> [Text]
citePublication :: Cite -> [Text]
citeAccessed :: Cite -> [UTCTime]
citeContent :: Cite -> [ContentReference]

-- | An Entry type, based on h-entry
--   <a>http://microformats.org/wiki/h-entry</a> with popular extensions.
data Entry
Entry :: [Text] -> [Text] -> [ContentReference] -> [UTCTime] -> [UTCTime] -> [CardReference] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [Text] -> [LocationReference] -> [EntryReference] -> [Text] -> [EntryReference] -> [EntryReference] -> [EntryReference] -> Entry
entryName :: Entry -> [Text]
entrySummary :: Entry -> [Text]
entryContent :: Entry -> [ContentReference]
entryPublished :: Entry -> [UTCTime]
entryUpdated :: Entry -> [UTCTime]
entryAuthor :: Entry -> [CardReference]
entryCategory :: Entry -> [Text]
entryUrl :: Entry -> [Text]
entryUid :: Entry -> [Text]
entryLocation :: Entry -> [LocationReference]
entryComments :: Entry -> [EntryReference]
entrySyndication :: Entry -> [Text]
entryInReplyTo :: Entry -> [EntryReference]
entryLikeOf :: Entry -> [EntryReference]
entryRepostOf :: Entry -> [EntryReference]
instance Typeable ContentReference
instance Typeable Geo
instance Typeable GeoReference
instance Typeable Adr
instance Typeable AdrReference
instance Typeable Card
instance Typeable CardReference
instance Typeable LocationReference
instance Typeable Cite
instance Typeable Entry
instance Typeable EntryReference
instance Eq ContentReference
instance Show ContentReference
instance Data ContentReference
instance Eq Geo
instance Show Geo
instance Data Geo
instance Eq GeoReference
instance Show GeoReference
instance Data GeoReference
instance Eq Adr
instance Show Adr
instance Data Adr
instance Eq AdrReference
instance Show AdrReference
instance Data AdrReference
instance Eq Card
instance Show Card
instance Data Card
instance Eq CardReference
instance Show CardReference
instance Data CardReference
instance Eq LocationReference
instance Show LocationReference
instance Data LocationReference
instance Eq Cite
instance Show Cite
instance Data Cite
instance Eq Entry
instance Show Entry
instance Data Entry
instance Eq EntryReference
instance Show EntryReference
instance Data EntryReference
instance Default Entry
instance Default Cite
instance Default Card
instance Default Adr
instance Default Geo


-- | TH-derived Aeson instances for Data.Microformats2.
module Data.Microformats2.Aeson
instance FromJSON Entry
instance ToJSON Entry
instance FromJSON Cite
instance ToJSON Cite
instance FromJSON Card
instance ToJSON Card
instance FromJSON Adr
instance ToJSON Adr
instance FromJSON Geo
instance ToJSON Geo
instance FromJSON ContentReference
instance ToJSON ContentReference
instance FromJSON EntryReference
instance ToJSON EntryReference
instance FromJSON CardReference
instance ToJSON CardReference
instance FromJSON LocationReference
instance ToJSON LocationReference
instance FromJSON AdrReference
instance ToJSON AdrReference
instance FromJSON GeoReference
instance ToJSON GeoReference


-- | TH-derived Setters instances for Data.Microformats2.
module Data.Microformats2.Setters
setGeoAltitude :: [Double] -> Geo -> Geo
setGeoLongitude :: [Double] -> Geo -> Geo
setGeoLatitude :: [Double] -> Geo -> Geo
setAdrGeo :: [GeoReference] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrLabel :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrCountryName :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrPostalCode :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrRegion :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrLocality :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrPostOfficeBox :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrExtendedAddress :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setAdrStreetAddress :: [Text] -> Adr -> Adr
setCardAnniversary :: [UTCTime] -> Card -> Card
setCardGenderIdentity :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardSex :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardImpp :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardRole :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardJobTitle :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardOrg :: [CardReference] -> Card -> Card
setCardKey :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardBday :: [UTCTime] -> Card -> Card
setCardNote :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardTel :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardAdr :: [AdrReference] -> Card -> Card
setCardCategory :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardUid :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardUrl :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardPhoto :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardLogo :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardEmail :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardNickname :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardHonorificSuffix :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardSortString :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardFamilyName :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardAdditionalName :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardGivenName :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardHonorificPrefix :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCardName :: [Text] -> Card -> Card
setCiteContent :: [ContentReference] -> Cite -> Cite
setCiteAccessed :: [UTCTime] -> Cite -> Cite
setCitePublication :: [Text] -> Cite -> Cite
setCiteUid :: [Text] -> Cite -> Cite
setCiteUrl :: [Text] -> Cite -> Cite
setCiteAuthor :: [CardReference] -> Cite -> Cite
setCitePublished :: [UTCTime] -> Cite -> Cite
setCiteName :: [Text] -> Cite -> Cite
setEntryRepostOf :: [EntryReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryLikeOf :: [EntryReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryInReplyTo :: [EntryReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntrySyndication :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryComments :: [EntryReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryLocation :: [LocationReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryUid :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryUrl :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryCategory :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryAuthor :: [CardReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryUpdated :: [UTCTime] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryPublished :: [UTCTime] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryContent :: [ContentReference] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntrySummary :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
setEntryName :: [Text] -> Entry -> Entry
